verses.roman:
tasmād rājñaḥ priyaṁ yūyaṁ
vayaṁ ca karavāma he
bhūtāni naḥ prasīdanti
sarva-bhūta-mayo nṛpaḥ

synonyms: tasmāt—therefore; rājñaḥ—the King's; priyam—pleasure; yūyam—You two; vayam—we; ca—also; karavāma he—let us do; bhūtāni—all living beings; naḥ—with us; prasīdanti—will be satisfied; sarva-bhūta—all beings; mayaḥ—comprising; nṛpaḥ—the king.
translation: Therefore let's do what the King wants. Everyone will be pleased with us, for the king embodies all living beings.
